hooks.prompt: Subagent starting. Ensure the subagent follows git workflow conventions and creates properly formatted commits.
Subagent stopping. Verify all git operations were completed successfully and no uncommitted changes remain.

Git operation requested. Check current branch status, uncommitted changes, and remote sync state before proceeding.
